title: 103_hr3793
content: Community Enterprise Revitalization Amendments Act - Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make economic development grants to enhance the security of housing loan guarantees under section 108 of such Act. Authorizes such grants' funding with recaptured urban development action grant (UDAG) amounts. Authorizes a UDAG amnesty program. Authorizes the Secretary to guarantee section 108-backed obligations.
